name: stance-change

effect.scarlet-violet: Changes aegislash to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using kings shield.

effect.the-indigo-disk: Changes aegislash to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using kings shield.

short_effect: Changes aegislash to Blade Forme before using a damaging move, or Shield Forme before using kings shield.
